subject: Minorities (US)
lead_paragraph: The interim president of the N.A.A.C.P., Dennis Hayes, belittled baseball’s efforts to increase black participation, chastising the majors leagues yesterday in a letter to Commissioner Bud Selig.
snippet: The interim president of the N.A.A.C.P., Dennis Hayes, belittled baseball’s efforts to increase black participation, chastising the majors leagues yesterday in a letter to Commissioner Bud Selig.
